column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Came here on a Saturday at 11AM
column2: said the wait was 1 hour for 2 people so left.  Then
column3: seeing as how my friend whom I was visiting lives so ridiculously close to this establishment
column4: we decided to try again for brunch on Sunday.  Came at 11:30AM
column5: and was told the wait would be 30-40 minutes.  We honestly waited for significantly longer than this....but I am willing to somewhat look beyond that because this would be their only con.
